summary: This document contains detailed billing information for a mobile account associated with Jeffrey E. Epstein, including account status, usage details, and various charges incurred over time. It highlights the frequent usage of the mobile service in various locations, primarily New York and Florida. This document contains detailed billing usage records for a mobile account, including call details, durations, and locations. It highlights numerous calls made from various locations, primarily in New York and Florida, over a period of time, indicating extensive mobile usage. This document contains detailed billing records for mobile phone usage associated with a specific account. It includes call details such as dates, times, durations, and locations for various calls made under a national plan. The records indicate frequent calls to and from locations in New York and West Palm Beach, Florida, among others.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
